mapper.select:
SELECT x.code_value as tj_result , COUNT(1) total FROM ag_cscf a LEFT JOIN xt_code x ON a.csztdm = x.code_key WHERE 1=1 AND x.type = 'xzcf'
and a.cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)
GROUP BY tj_result

SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM ag_cscf a LEFT JOIN xt_code x ON a.lx = x.code_key WHERE x.code_value = '行政处罚'
and a.cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)

SELECT j.jqlb as jqlb , COUNT(1) total FROM ag_jqxx j LEFT JOIN ag_cscf c ON j.jqbh = c.jqbh LEFT JOIN xt_code x ON c.lx = x.code_key WHERE x.type = 'cscflx' AND x.code_value = '行政处罚'
and c.cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)
GROUP BY j.jqlb

SELECT * FROM ag_cscf a LEFT JOIN xt_code x ON a.lx = x.code_key WHERE x.code_value = '行政处罚'
and a.cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)

SELECT ac.* from ag_cscf ac LEFT JOIN xt_code xc ON ac.csztdm = xc.code_key where xc.type = 'xzcf' and ac.lx = 1
and cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)

SELECT ac.*,bc.ab,bc.abmc from ag_cscf ac INNER JOIN ba_case bc ON ac.ajbh = bc.ajbh where ac.lx = 1
and ac.cjsj > DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - ${day} DAY)
GROUP BY bc.ab

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ag_gjxx WHERE gjly = 1
and DATE_FORMAT( gjsj, '%Y-%m-%d') = ${useDate}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ag_yjxx WHERE yjly = 1
and DATE_FORMAT( yjsj, '%Y-%m-%d') = ${useDate}
